page.title: 20S-cum-B. Houses & Occupiers2
page.content: 5. Also 'The Paddocks' - One man a school teacher at Brant Broughton. 6. 'Fairview Stud'-Large square stone house, old but well modernised. Dutch barn and outbuildings.Approx.30 acres. The property was a stud for only a short time when the previous owner kept a small herd of shetland ponies. Couple with four children, oldest 13yrs., youngest born last winter. Farmer, mainly beef cattle, wheat and rape. He is also a traveller for a firm producing agricultural chemicals. 7. 'Apricot Hall' - Old cottage style Lincolnshire farmhouse with out_ buildings and four acres of land. Couple, both AOPs. Husband formerly a British Rail Officer for 35 years. Two children both living away from the village.
